attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in response to the earlier petitiion which as usual the government sees fit to brush under the carpet by not even answering the question correctly. Its very simple consumers should not have to pay BT for a line which they dont use. If I get internet from a service provider and a telephone service from another provider why shoul dI still have to pay BT for a line which has been there for the last 25 years. Simple BT IS A JOKE

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
